channel.title: [PI] can someone convert delta ::commands to work on PI for me? LOOK

item.title: [PI] can someone convert delta ::commands to work on PI for me? LOOK
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

here is the delta ::commands command.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dgr@Commands", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@bla@Player Commands", 8145); sendQuest("@bla@::master", 8147); sendQuest("@bla@::home", 8148); sendQuest("@bla@::home", 8149); sendQuest("@bla@::vengrunes", 8150); sendQuest("@bla@::barragerunes", 8151); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
could any of you convert that so it will work on my PI source? Thanks Bowzer.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] can someone convert delta ::commands to work on PI for me? LOOK
